data.description:

Nestle India Ltd. ( (IN:NESTLEIND) ) has provided an announcement.

Nestle India Limited has uploaded the audio-video recording of its recent analyst and institutional investors meet, which took place on February 4, 2025. This move enhances transparency and provides stakeholders with insights into the company’s business performance, showcasing Nestle India’s commitment to maintaining open communication with its investors and analysts.

More about Nestle India Ltd.

Nestle India Limited operates in the food and beverage industry, focusing on producing and marketing a wide array of products including dairy items, beverages, and culinary products. The company is a market leader in the packaged food sector in India, known for its emphasis on quality and innovation.

data.title: Apollo Minerals Initiates Phase 2 Drilling at Salanie Gold Project
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Apollo Minerals Limited ( (AU:AON) ) has provided an announcement.

Apollo Minerals Limited has begun Phase 2 drilling at the Salanie Gold Project in Gabon, following promising results from its 2024 program that indicated a high-grade gold system. The current drill phase aims to expand the identified A1 Prospect and explore additional prospects, with the potential to uncover broader mineralized areas, enhancing the project’s value and strategic position in the gold mining sector.

More about Apollo Minerals Limited

Apollo Minerals Limited operates in the mining industry, focusing on gold exploration and development. The company is primarily engaged in identifying and expanding gold resources, with a significant project located in Gabon.

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Buy

Current Market Cap: €6.38M

Eclipx Group Ltd. ( (AU:FPR) ) has issued an announcement.

FleetPartners Group Limited has announced an update on its ongoing buy-back program, indicating that a total of 70,655,490 securities have been bought back prior to the previous day, with an additional 139,189 securities bought back on the previous day. This buy-back activity is part of the company’s strategy to manage its capital structure and potentially improve shareholder value, reflecting its focus on optimizing operational efficiencies and financial health.

FleetPartners Group Limited, operating under the ASX code FPR, is a company involved in the fleet management and leasing industry. data.title: Diversified Royalty Corp. Declares February 2025 Cash Dividend
data.description:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Diversified Royalty Corp ( (TSE:DIV) ) has shared an update.

Diversified Royalty Corp. announced a cash dividend of $0.02083 per common share for February 2025, reflecting a $0.25 annualized rate. This decision underscores DIV’s strategy for predictable and stable dividends, aiming to grow cash flow per share through strategic royalty acquisitions. The dividend is set to be distributed on February 28, 2025, to shareholders recorded by February 14, 2025, indicating a continued commitment to shareholder returns.

More about Diversified Royalty Corp

Diversified Royalty Corp. (DIV) is a multi-royalty corporation based in North America, focusing on acquiring top-line royalties from multi-location businesses and franchisors. Its portfolio includes brands such as Mr. Lube + Tires, AIR MILES®, Sutton, Mr. Mikes, Nurse Next Door, Oxford Learning Centres, Stratus Building Solutions, and BarBurrito, spanning industries from automotive services and loyalty programs to real estate, dining, home care, education, and cleaning services.

data.title: Duos Technologies Secures Future with New Executive Contracts
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Duos Technologies Group ( (DUOT) ) just unveiled an announcement.

On January 31, 2025, Duos Technologies Group, Inc. announced new Employment Agreements with key executives Charles Ferry, Adrian Goldfarb, and Christopher King effective January 1, 2025. These agreements, replacing previous ones, are set for an initial term of three years with automatic extensions, unless terminated with notice. The agreements outline base salaries and potential bonuses based on performance metrics. Additionally, the executives received equity awards under the company’s 2021 Equity Incentive Plan, subject to a three-year vesting period. This move signifies the company’s commitment to aligning executive incentives with long-term growth and stability.

More about Duos Technologies Group

data.description:

  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest update is out from Cosa Resources Corp. ( (TSE:COSA) ).

Cosa Resources Corp. has announced a private placement to raise C$5 million, involving the sale of units and charity flow-through units. Denison Mines, Cosa’s largest shareholder, will participate to maintain its stake. The proceeds will fund exploration and working capital, potentially impacting Cosa’s operational expansion and market positioning.

More about Cosa Resources Corp.

Cosa Resources Corp. operates in the exploration and development sector, focusing on mineral resources. The company is involved in offering securities for funding exploration and working capital, with notable shareholder participation from Denison Mines, a significant player in the uranium mining industry.

L1 Long Short Fund Ltd. announced its Net Tangible Assets (NTA) backing per share as of January 31, 2025, with the NTA before tax being $2.9439 and after tax $2.9106. data.title: Modiv Announces 2024 Financial Results Release Date
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Modiv ( (MDV) ) has issued an update.

On February 4, 2025, Modiv Industrial, Inc. announced it will release its fourth quarter and full-year financial results for 2024 on March 4, 2025. The company also disclosed its estimated net asset value (NAV) per share as of December 31, 2024, which is $24.11. Modiv engaged Cushman & Wakefield, an independent valuation firm, for the appraisal of its real estate assets. This valuation will inform stakeholders about the fair value of the company’s assets, though it is worth noting that NAV calculations are not based on GAAP and are subject to significant professional judgment. The announcement does not impact the company’s obligation to update this information in future disclosures.

More about Modiv

Modiv Industrial, Inc. is an internally managed real estate investment trust (REIT) focused exclusively on acquiring single-tenant net-lease industrial manufacturing properties. The company targets critical industrial manufacturing properties with long-term leases to tenants that support the national economy and enhance supply chain efficiency.
